result.title: Summer — Session #2 — Segment Trees
result.content:
AlSalam Alikom,

Please check the following resources about segment trees:

  • Topcoder tutorial about segment trees and RMQ
  • Codeforces intro tutorial to segment trees
  • Another intro tutorial to segment trees
  • New contest covering segment tree homework problems
  • More problems from codeforces
  • More problems on different online judges

Note that the above tutorials talk about more variations on segment trees than what we covered today — it's recommended to give this a read after understanding the basic concepts. Also, keep the extra problems in your queue to re-visit afterwards.

Thanks,
